Certificate management¶

Admin / certificate management

New certificate :

  • Generate Let’s encrypt certificate

  • Upload certificate

  • Generate self signed Certificate.

https://wiki.sangoma.com/display/FPG/Certificate+Management+User+Guide

Admin / System admin / Port management

Je passe Admin en port 8080 car 80 est en conflit avec lets encrypt.

Admin / certificate Management / generate lestencryp certificate mais cela ne marche pas.

On va choisir le certificat généré ci dessus dans System Admin / HHTPS Setup
